decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policy H8, Replacement UDP Policy 5.9. | No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.  REASON:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policy H33, Replacement UDP Policy 5.5. | The extension permitted shall not be used or occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 40 Whitton Drive, Greenford.  REASON:	To ensure that the character of the area is preserved and a separate dwelling is not created, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B1, B5, H8, H9, H11, H26, T50, T63, Replacement UDP Policies 4.1, 5.5, 5.6, 5.9, 9.1, 9.11.
description: Part single and two storey side extension, single storey rear and side/rear extension and single storey side/front projection to align with front entrance porch to house
